DOC.brief_summary: The aim study examine prevalence Metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) Korean patient schizophrenia . Primary objective : • To investigate prevalence MetS Korean patient schizophrenia Secondary objective : • To compare prevalence MetS among 3 group accord antipsychotic : typical antipsychotic monotherapy group , atypical antipsychotic monotherapy group , 2 antipsychotic group ( polypharmacy )
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Metabolic Syndrome Patients With Schizophrenia Korea
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis schizophrenia accord DSMIVTR Age 1865 year
